content.description: You and your team have chartered a yacht with an experienced skipper and a two-person crew. A fire breaks out, destroying much of the yacht and its contents. The yacht is slowly sinking and your location is unclear. The skipper and crew were lost while trying to fight the fire. You are approximately 1000 miles southwest of the nearest landfall.

content.item: 20 square feet of opaque plastic sheeting
content.description: Useful for collecting rainwater or as a shelter.
Can be used to catch fish for food.
Can be used for signaling for rescue.
Potentially useful for starting fires or signaling.
